title: PersonaBot
description: An iOS app that lets users create and customize intelligent bots with unique knowledge bases and behaviors. It combines a Swift frontend with a Python backend using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) via OpenAI's ChatGPT and LlamaIndex for fully personalized bot experiences.
highlights: Customizable knowledge bases per persona, synced with iCloud.
Hybrid SwiftUI interface powered by a Python FastAPI backend.
Retrieval-Augmented Generation pipeline using LlamaIndex and OpenAI models.

title: GamesFolio
description: A simple portfolio built with Three.js showcasing all the games I've created in my free time or during my studies, mostly developed with Unity.
highlights: Interactive gallery built with Three.js scenes for each project.
Dynamic content sourced from Markdown files for easy updates.
Optimized bundle with lazy loaded scenes for faster first paint.

title: StarFoundation
description: A small collaborative text-based RPG built during a data-structures class. We focused on clean data modeling, reused the serialization formats from the syllabus, and picked Ruby to explore a new language. I built it with my teammate Pierre Louis.
highlights: Narrative text RPG about a space outlaw seeking revenge, with branching encounters resolved by dice rolls.
Events modeled in JSON, saves stored in XML, and a final adventure recap exported to Markdown.
Built in Ruby alongside Pierre Louis to explore a new language under classroom constraints.
